name: Shipwreck Adventure
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Mouse -> Left click (click & drag)
  • Keyboard -> UpArrow - DownArrow - Space Bar

Sail until shipwreck!

Shipwreck Adventure lets you sail through sharks, krakens, pirate ships and more!

Grab all the cannonballs to destroy your obstacles.

Avoid the sea monsters, if you can...

Shipwreck Adventure features:

* Achievements and Leaderboards to check on your friends navigation skill

* Easy to play, to master, we don't know...
